detailedItinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh Arrival – Private Afternoon Cu Chi Tunnels (No meal)
details: Arrive in Ho Chi Minh City and meet the private driver for transfer to the hotel for baggage storage.
12:30 – Depart for Cu Chi Tunnels, a legendary 220 km underground network from the Vietnam War era.
Discover tunnel life, hidden entrances, and wartime relics while the guide shares historical insights.
18:30 – Return to the hotel for check-in, free evening and overnight in Ho Chi Minh City.

detailedItinerary.title: Private Mekong Delta Discovery (Breakfast)
details: 08:30 – Pick-up for a scenic drive through rice paddies and orchards toward My Tho.
Board a motor boat along the Mekong River, visit local villages, and ride a rowing boat through coconut canals.
Continue to Ben Tre for a handmade coconut candy workshop and taste tropical fruits with traditional music.
Return by boat and drive back to Saigon; arrival around 17:00. Evening at leisure.

detailedItinerary.title: Ho Chi Minh Departure (Breakfast)
details: Breakfast at hotel and leisure time.
Private transfer to Ho Chi Minh City (SGN) airport for departure. Tour ends.
